xldoc.title: Writing and The Arts
xldoc.description: Material about writing and the arts.
xldoc.author: rbj

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: We have here some writings about writing and the arts. Also some collections of writings organised by their form rather than their content, mostly philosophical.

sbcol.subsec: Intended as a resource for people writing for publication on the web. Some stuff about what I am doing here, some links to other resources.
